param.description: Virtual machine to revert to the current snapshot

param.name: host
param.description: Choice of host for the virtual machine, if this operation causes the virtual machine to power on

workflow-item.name: item0
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.library.vc.vm.snapshot").revertToCurrentSnapshot(vm,host) ;

bind.name: vm
bind.description: The VM to revert to the current snapshot

bind.name: host
bind.description: Choice of host for the virtual machine, in case this operation causes the virtual machine to power on.

workflow-item.description: Reverts the virtual machine to the current snapshot. This is equivalent to doing snapshot.currentSnapshot.revert. If no snapshot exists, then the operation does nothing, and the virtual machine state remains unchanged.

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.library.vc.basic").vim3WaitTaskEnd(task,progress,pollRate) ;

bind.name: progress
bind.description: Log progess while waiting for the task

bind.name: pollRate
bind.description: Polling rate for the task state [seconds]

workflow-item.description: Wait a VIM 3 Task to end. When task ended, return the

p-param.name: vm
